<div class="header module">
<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/3413384">Auctions and Consequences</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/fems/pseuds/fems" rel="author">fems</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">
<span class="landmark">Fandoms:</span>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Slavery has been abolished for good reason, but apparently not everyone got the memo… landing Sam and Jack in hot water.</p>
<p>
</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>1</strong> of <a href="/series/755760">Auctions</a>
</li>

</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>"Carter, why don’t you enlighten us on where exactly you’ve been and what exactly you’ve been doing?”</p>
<p>Trying to ascertain what it is he wants her to say, she takes a moment first to read his eyes. “I’ve been with you almost the entire time sir.” </p>
<p>The visible tension in his body tells her that his emotions are still firmly fixed in pissed off mode. “Well, obviously not.”</p>
<p>Clearly something isn’t right.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Sam/Jack, S8. Cassie has a question that gets Sam and Jack thinking. This took on a little life of its own. Originally written for SamJackShipDay but went off track so doesn't fit the prompt it was supposed to. Threads spoilers.</p>
</blockquote>

<p>
<textarea cols="50" id="embed_code_572920327" rows="4">&lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/works/25569304"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;If the World was Ending&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt; (3619 words) by &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/users/purplejellosg1"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;purplejellosg1&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Chapters: 1/1&lt;br /&gt;Fandom: &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/tags/Stargate%20SG-1"&gt;Stargate SG-1&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Rating: General Audiences&lt;br /&gt;Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply&lt;br /&gt;Relationships: Samantha "Sam" Carter/Jack O'Neill, Samantha "Sam" Carter/Pete Shanahan, Kerry Johnson/Jack O'Neill&lt;br /&gt;Characters: Samantha "Sam" Carter, Jack O'Neill, Cassandra Fraiser&lt;br /&gt;Additional Tags: Friendship, Romance, Slow Romance, Unresolved Romantic Tension, Unresolved Sexual Tension, samjackshipday&lt;br /&gt;Summary: &lt;p&gt;Sam/Jack, S8. Cassie has a question that gets Sam and Jack thinking. This took on a little life of its own. Originally written for SamJackShipDay but went off track so doesn't fit the prompt it was supposed to. Threads spoilers.&lt;/p&gt;</textarea>
</p>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>So, this was the first thing I ever wrote. Looking back, it's total cliche-fic and switches POV too much but it's still fun. :)</p>
</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>
<i>Like everyone else, Jack had grown up hearing stories about what it was like for people to fall in love with their soulmates. The story went that, as soulmates’ feelings for each other grew, the world ignited into color in a way that those who had not found their soulmates would, apparently, never be able to understand.</i>
</p>
</blockquote>

<b>100 Kinks: 	31. Fully clothed</b>
</p><p>“Yes, Sir, I, and a few others, have explained the UCMJ to him and he, he has trouble accepting that you or I would take words on a page that seriously.”</p>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Kate forgot how awkward and confusing Gibbs can be. Gibbs forgot that Kate doesn't back down from a challenge and is just as curious and stubborn as he is.</p><p>Neither of them expected to find something they had long wanted hidden in the translation :)</p><p>~~~</p><p>Hover boxes will (in theory - please let me know if any don't work) appear with translation if you move your mouse over the foreign language phrases, however, I did test this on non-linguists ;) and you <i>don't</i> need to know exactly what's being said to follow the story ;D You'll just be in the same position as Kate, so whether you choose initially to read it without sneaking a peek or not is up to you.</p><p>I have also provided translations at the end for people on tablets or mobile phones, for whom the hover boxes won't work.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>She had made her peace with it. They couldn't be together.<br/>Pete loved her, and she would build a life with him.</p><p>Until Annie Lennox started playing on the jukebox.</p><p>Some scenes that should have been in Threads (8-18), and a moment of justice for fellow "ugh"ers of Pete...</p><p>--oOo--</p>
</blockquote>
<!--stats-->
<dl class="stats">
<dt class="language">Language:</dt>
<dd class="language">English</dd>

They couldn't be together.&lt;br /&gt;Pete loved her, and she would build a life with him.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Until Annie Lennox started playing on the jukebox.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Some scenes that should have been in Threads (8-18), and a moment of justice for fellow "ugh"ers of Pete...&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;--oOo--&lt;/p&gt;</textarea>

<!--title, author, fandom-->
<div class="header module">
<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/17454290">Make it rain</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/RhinoHill/pseuds/RhinoHill" rel="author">RhinoHill</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">
<span class="landmark">Fandoms:</span>
<a class="tag" href="/tags/Stargate%20SG-1/works">Stargate SG-1</a>
       
    </h5>
<!--required tags-->
<ul class="required-tags">
<li> <a aria-controls="#modal" class="help symbol question modal" href="/help/symbols-key.html" title="Symbols key"><span class="rating-mature rating" title="Mature"><span class="text">Mature</span></span></a></li>

<!--warnings again, cast, freeform tags-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jack%20O'Neill/works">Jack O'Neill</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Daniel%20Jackson/works">Daniel Jackson</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Romance/works">Romance</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>In the months following the Za'tarc test, Sam has replayed her conversation with her C.O. daily.<br/>She has been true to her word. Nothing that passed between them has ever left the room.</p>
<p>No-one has to know that she visits the room every chance she gets.<br/>And as long as she remembers to shut the door carefully behind her, no-one ever will.</p>
</blockquote>
<!--stats-->

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p></p><blockquote>
<p>He bought a house.</p>
<p>Or he started the process of buying a house. Sam realizes she doesn't want to know which, as he guides her from one room to the next, chatting incessantly. She follows him in a daze, as if she's walking through waist high water, trying and failing to listen and actually hear what he's saying.</p>
</blockquote>Or Kerry isn't at Jack's house
    </blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>“Why did you touch the sacred stone?”<br/>Jack did touch the stone, but in his defence, it looked neat. All round and glittery.<br/>He shrugged, “It’s who I am as a person.”</p>
</blockquote>
<!--stats-->

<div class="header module">
<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/26424511">When A Present Falls Into Your Lap, Don't Ask</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/captain_sassy_socks/pseuds/captain_sassy_socks" rel="author">captain_sassy_socks</a>



        for <a href="/users/starrybouquet/gifts">starrybouquet</a>

<h5 class="fandoms heading">
<span class="landmark">Fandoms:</span>

    </h5>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jack%20O'Neill/works">Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Humor/works">Humor</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Episode:%20s08e16-17%20Reckoning/works">Episode: s08e16-17 Reckoning</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Sam lurches forward, hand raised, and finger pointing at Thor. “No way, I’m gonna let you-”</p>
<p>The white light engulfs her.</p>
<p>“-sacrifice yourself.” Her feet connect with the wooden top of the General’s desk as he, himself, comes into sight at an unusual angle. The momentum propels her forward. Before she can contemplate her strange situation, she steps on air. “Ahh-”</p>
</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Jack’s Mark rolls and twists up over his left bicep and spreads over his heart. The thick, dark ink loops in large circles with smaller, solid circles dotting each ring in no particular pattern. In the middle of the ring, right over his heart, in shining gold lettering against the solid black ink is a solitary S.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>What if future Sam made it through with the note they sent back into the past?</p>
</blockquote>

<a href="/works/21685909">Obelisks and Existentialism</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/spatulacity/pseuds/spatulacity" rel="author">spatulacity</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jack%20O'Neill/works">Jack O'Neill</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Teal'c%20(Stargate)/works">Teal'c (Stargate)</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Daniel%20Jackson/works">Daniel Jackson</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Janet%20Fraiser/works">Janet Fraiser</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/duplicate/works">duplicate</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/clone/works">clone</a></li>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>"I thought Thor put preventative measures in place to deter Loki from attempting to clone you again, O'Neill." His face was perfectly straight except for the slight crinkle at his left eye, which only those who knew him well even knew to look for. </p>
<p>"Not Loki." the two muttered in tandem.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Daniel is back and all is right with SG-1 again. At least it would be, if Daniel could just remember a couple of things…</p>
</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>The team is at the cabin, it's late, and there is a Bedroom Situation.  A cliche cabin fic--the cliche is sharing a bed, because I am predictable. My thanks to annienau08 for the beta--among so many other things.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>When Jack is injured offworld, he wakes up believing he and Sam are married. To each other.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>After a terrible accident Jack has lost his memory. Will he ever be able to remember?</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>They shouldn't be doing it now, but something broke between them, and this is the only way they can fix it.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>

</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Jack sighed. As it turned out – and despite what his former team might have told him – being 'The Man' definitely had more cons than pros attached to it.</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>27</strong> of <a href="/series/1234973">Bizarre Holidays</a>
</li>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Jack glances around the immediate vicinity and smiles. He can’t remember the last time the team were fortunate enough to have a mission like this: good food, friendly hosts, no pesky Goa’uld trying to kill them… everything is pretty much perfect.</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>238</strong> of <a href="/series/1234973">Bizarre Holidays</a>
</li>
</ul>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>“I called him Sir.” She blurts out, regretting her words as soon as she speaks them.</p>
</blockquote>

<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/25877506">Battling Nightmares Together</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/Into_The_Mystic/pseuds/Into_The_Mystic" rel="author">Into_The_Mystic</a>
</h4>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Sam and Jack have gone through so much together. Nightmares are to be expected. This ongoing series is about how they provide comfort to each other during the hard times. It’s about “Always.”<br/>Each chapter stands alone. Any rating changes and/or warnings will be noted in the Chapter summary.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>When a mission goes wrong, Sam and Jack suffer the after effects of an unusual connection between them.</p>
</blockquote>

<textarea cols="50" id="embed_code_540626119" rows="4">&lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/works/20048035"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compulsion&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt; (50206 words) by &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/users/sharim28"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;sharim28&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Chapters: 20/?&lt;br /&gt;Fandom: &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/tags/Stargate%20SG-1"&gt;Stargate SG-1&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Rating: Explicit&lt;br /&gt;Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings&lt;br /&gt;Relationships: Samantha "Sam" Carter/Jack O'Neill&lt;br /&gt;Characters: Samantha "Sam" Carter, Jack O'Neill&lt;br /&gt;Additional Tags: Tropes, Smut, Shameless Smut, Gratuitous Smut, Smut smut and more smut, Did I mention some smut?, Plot With Porn, Porn With Plot, well porn with trope really, nellie please note this fic contains smut, okay so there is plot, quite a lot of plot apparently, but there is DEFINITELY smut in this fic nellie&lt;br /&gt;Summary: &lt;p&gt;When a mission goes wrong, Sam and Jack suffer the after effects of an unusual connection between them.&lt;/p&gt;</textarea>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Why did Jack just leave in 2010? (S4E16)</p><p>Because he couldn't watch her<br/>folding herself<br/>smaller and smaller<br/>until all that was left<br/>was Mrs Him</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>While exploring the ruins on a friendly planet Sam triggers a trap and is taken captive. Jack watches as time runs down and he is forced to face a question that steals his breath—has time run out for them?</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>When certain inhabitants of the mountain start singing, it can only mean serious trouble.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Having a Team Baby kind of changes everything. Obviously.</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>2</strong> of <a href="/series/1863022">There's no 'I' in 'Team Baby'</a>
</li>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>He knew the minute the words left his mouth that it was the stupidest question he’d ever asked. At the time, that certainty was progress of a sort. No one, including him, knew much about the “Naked One”---no dearest wish, no fondest memory, no wildest night. Stupidest question was a start.</p>
</blockquote>

<h4 class="heading">

      by

      <!-- do not cache -->

</h4>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>His eyes moved over the leather, taking in her curves, and the hug of the black material against her hips and long legs. He trailed his fingertips slowly up and down her body, “So, tell me something Carter, do you really want to play this game?”</p>
</blockquote>

<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/13468128">SG-1 And A Baby Makes Five (you do the math)</a>
      by

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Daniel is looking at the bundle of blankets in Sam’s arms like it's a grenade, the pin lost only seconds ago to a black hole. Teal’c looks stoic as ever, his face unreadable to all but his closest friends. Jack is trying not to smile but, c’mon-</p><p>“You acquire a kid, Carter?”</p><p>*</p><p>Accidental baby acquisition, General Hammond's blessing, and Daniel's inability to name children.</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>1</strong> of <a href="/series/1863022">There's no 'I' in 'Team Baby'</a>
</li>
</ul>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>It was in those intimate, stolen moments that Jacob noticed a side to the two officers he never had before. Even now, Jack’s expression had softened as he watched Sam sleep. Missing scene for season 3's The Devil You Know.</p>
</blockquote>

Even now, Jack’s expression had softened as he watched Sam sleep. Missing scene for season 3's The Devil You Know.&lt;/p&gt;</textarea>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>It was a rough day. That’s the only reason for him to be the person behind her door 20 minutes before midnight.</p>
</blockquote>

<!--title, author, fandom-->
<div class="header module">
<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/17133743">Scotch Tape and Christmas Eve</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/Kinggorilla/pseuds/Kinggorilla" rel="author">Kinggorilla</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">
<span class="landmark">Fandoms:</span>
<a class="tag" href="/tags/Stargate%20SG-1/works">Stargate SG-1</a>
       
    </h5>
<!--required tags-->
<ul class="required-tags">
<li> <a aria-controls="#modal" class="help symbol question modal" href="/help/symbols-key.html" title="Symbols key"><span class="rating-teen rating" title="Teen And Up Audiences"><span class="text">Teen And Up Audiences</span></span></a></li>

<!--warnings again, cast, freeform tags-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jack%20O'Neill/works">Jack O'Neill</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Daniel%20Jackson/works">Daniel Jackson</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Teal'c%20(Stargate)/works">Teal'c (Stargate)</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Christmas%20Party/works">Christmas Party</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>"Not all people are cut out for the party life."</p><p>This was bugging me for most of yesterday, so I sat down and ripped it out in one shot.<br/>My apologies if it's a little rough around the edges.</p><p>Intermittent salty language and cocktail wieners in bbq sauce. You were warned</p><p>Hat tip to the gracious Sophiehatt3r, the inimitable Samcaarter, the redoubtable bethanyactually, and the unsinkable ProfessorTennant.  Hopefully, you recognize your influence.  Hugs to lots of others who contributed in too many ways to name.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Sam Carter made herself a promise, and now the chance has come, she's determined to keep it.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>"If I'm going to tie her up, I'm going to do it safely."<br/></p>
</blockquote>
<!--stats-->
<dl class="stats">
<dt class="language">Language:</dt>

<dt class="words">Words:</dt>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>What happens when Jack and Harry are rescued at the conclusion of the Season 6 episode Paradise Lost.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>What if the conversation in Affinity had gone just a little bit differently? Written for the SamJackShipDay prompt 'Empty'. Sam/Jack, of course. Mentions of Grace, Heroes pt 2, The Lost City, New Order, Affinity.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>How many times can they face death together before something gives?</p>
<p>For Ship Day 2020</p>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>

</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>What would you do if the person you loved finally told you how they felt?</p><p>What would you do if they did it in their sleep?</p><p> </p><p>--oOo--</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Sam is getting unusual gifts from a secret admirer. Who could it be? Just a bit of fluffy J/S shippyness I wrote. <br/>****Nominated for Sam and Jack Multimedia Award-Characterization of Sam (2014) and Sam Centric (2015)****</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>

</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>When an off-world mission involves fish, Naquadah, a foreign language and a loincloth, it was better, in hindsight, to have shoved this trip onto another SG team’s plate. Resolutely S/J.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>"WAIT! Don't touch the white ones!" he shouted, wincing when he realized it was too late.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Jack and Sam are trapped by an Ancient device that gives them the ability to hear each others thoughts. Set shorty after S08e07 Affinity.</p>
</blockquote>

</div>
<!--warnings again, cast, freeform tags-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jack%20O'Neill/works">Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Language%20of%20Flowers/works">Language of Flowers</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>When Daniel reveals to Sam and Jack that unbeknownst to their knowledge they accidentally got married on their latest off world trip, long thought buried feelings break through the surface. S/J</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Jack O’Neill should not be at Samantha Carter’s house at ten o’clock at night.  It was true on a good day, and it was especially true today.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Maybe, he thinks, contemplating the perfect line of her cheek and glint of hair in the starlight, this is where they were headed all along.</p>
</blockquote>

</blockquote>

<!--title, author, fandom-->
<div class="header module">
<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/24222202">First Breath After Coma</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/thosepoorsouls/pseuds/thosepoorsouls" rel="author">thosepoorsouls</a>



        for <a href="/users/Maybeitstimetoearnmybluebead/gifts">Maybeitstimetoearnmybluebead</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">
<span class="landmark">Fandoms:</span>
<a class="tag" href="/tags/Stargate%20SG-1/works">Stargate SG-1</a>
       
    </h5>
<!--required tags-->
<ul class="required-tags">
<li> <a aria-controls="#modal" class="help symbol question modal" href="/help/symbols-key.html" title="Symbols key"><span class="rating-teen rating" title="Teen And Up Audiences"><span class="text">Teen And Up Audiences</span></span></a></li>

<!--warnings again, cast, freeform tags-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jack%20O'Neill/works">Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Getting%20Together/works">Getting Together</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/the%20cabin%20at%20the%20end%20of%20threads/works">the cabin at the end of threads</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Jack arrived at the cabin with some supplies and a weird feeling of finality. While he was unpacking the dust that had accumulated while the cabin stood empty seemed to gather in his lungs, and as the time for his first guest’s arrival came closer it got progressively harder and harder to breathe. He stepped out on the porch for some fresh forest air just as the sun started to set, and time seemed endless and not long enough at the same time. He had so much future that needed actual plans but all he could think of was tomorrow.</p>
</blockquote>
<!--stats-->

<a href="http://tumblr.com/widgets/share/tool?canonicalUrl=https%3A%2F%2Farchiveofourown.org%2Fworks%2F24222202&amp;title=First%20Breath%20After%20Coma%20%28607%20words%29%20by%20thosepoorsouls%20%5BAO3%5D&amp;caption=Chapters%3A%201%2F1%3Cbr%20%2F%3EFandom%3A%20%3Ca%20href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Farchiveofourown.org%2Ftags%2FStargate%2520SG-1%22%3EStargate%20SG-1%3C%2Fa%3E%3Cbr%20%2F%3ERating%3A%20Teen%20And%20Up%20Audiences%3Cbr%20%2F%3EWarnings%3A%20No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply%3Cbr%20%2F%3ERelationships%3A%20Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter%2FJack%20O%27Neill%3Cbr%20%2F%3ECharacters%3A%20Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter%2C%20Jack%20O%27Neill%3Cbr%20%2F%3EAdditional%20Tags%3A%20Getting%20Together%2C%20the%20cabin%20at%20the%20end%20of%20threads%3Cbr%20%2F%3ESummary%3A%20%3Cp%3EJack%20arrived%20at%20the%20cabin%20with%20some%20supplies%20and%20a%20weird%20feeling%20of%20finality.%20While%20he%20was%20unpacking%20the%20dust%20that%20had%20accumulated%20while%20the%20cabin%20stood%20empty%20seemed%20to%20gather%20in%20his%20lungs%2C%20and%20as%20the%20time%20for%20his%20first%20guest%E2%80%99s%20arrival%20came%20closer%20it%20got%20progressively%20harder%20and%20harder%20to%20breathe.%20He%20stepped%20out%20on%20the%20porch%20for%20some%20fresh%20forest%20air%20just%20as%20the%20sun%20started%20to%20set%2C%20and%20time%20seemed%20endless%20and%20not%20long%20enough%20at%20the%20same%20time.%20He%20had%20so%20much%20future%20that%20needed%20actual%20plans%20but%20all%20he%20could%20think%20of%20was%20tomorrow.%3C%2Fp%3E" style="display:inline-block; text-indent:-9999px; overflow:hidden; width:81px; height:20px; background:url('//platform.tumblr.com/v1/share_1.png') top left no-repeat transparent; border-bottom: none;" target="_blank" title="Share on Tumblr">

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>On a quiet Saturday morning, the original members of SG-1 meet up for breakfast, where Sam and Jack have some news to share.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Two lost souls hook up for a night of alcohol fueled passion but a year later, they have to work together as a team. Jack wasn’t the only one keeping his home life very private. AU</p>
</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Jack is badly injured by an ambush after agreeing to meet with the people of Amoridia but that’s the least of their worries as he wakes unable to remember who he is.</p>
</blockquote>

<div class="header module">
<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/17534309">What's Your Poison?</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/wackyjacqs/pseuds/wackyjacqs" rel="author">wackyjacqs</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">
<span class="landmark">Fandoms:</span>
<a class="tag" href="/tags/Stargate%20SG-1/works">Stargate SG-1</a>
       
    </h5>
<!--required tags-->

<!--warnings again, cast, freeform tags-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jack%20O'Neill/works">Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Team%20Bonding/works">Team Bonding</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Jack gestured for her to go into the kitchen and as he followed, he couldn’t help but let his gaze wander. He had never seen the captain out of her BDUs or combat gear and he decided that she had a nice figure. He knew that already though, as a flashback of their first meeting entered his mind, but seeing her dressed in civvies, in his home, seemed to reinforce the thought tenfold.</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>24</strong> of <a href="/series/1234973">Bizarre Holidays</a>
</li>
</ul>

<!--title, author, fandom-->
<div class="header module">
<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/23701897">Stuck On You</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/wackyjacqs/pseuds/wackyjacqs" rel="author">wackyjacqs</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">
<span class="landmark">Fandoms:</span>
<a class="tag" href="/tags/Stargate%20SG-1/works">Stargate SG-1</a>
       
    </h5>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jack%20O'Neill/works">Jack O'Neill</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>“Carter,” a little puff of air ruffles her fringe as he sighs, “please tell me you’re – that sweater – that you’ve – ”</p>
<p>He refuses to meet Sam’s gaze, but given their close proximity, he feels every movement as she slowly shakes her head.</p>
<p>“No, sir.”</p>
<p>“Yeah,” he murmurs, “that’s what I figured.”</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>It's their first date. Except I've hashed this idea out so many times, this series will be many, many first dates.</p>
</blockquote>

          Part <strong>1</strong> of <a href="/series/1707853">Fifty First Dates</a>

<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/23616367">being with you gets me that way (just breathe)</a>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>In the weeks after the events at the Alpha Site, Sam can't sleep and Hammond sends her home. Pete calls, determined to help her through. But one thing is absolutely crystal clear: she knows for a fact that if she decides she needs someone tonight, it will not be Pete that she calls.</p><p>Which is exactly why Colonel Jack O'Neill is in her kitchen right now.</p>
</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>What would have happened if Sam had survived the Aschen attack and accompanied Jack's note back into the past…?</p>
</blockquote>

</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>"Hi. Um. God, I feel silly doing this. But it’s only an old laptop, I guess. Not too much to lose apart from my dignity.. Okay. Phew. So here goes. Hello SG-1! If that’s what you’re called in your version of the universe. If that mirror that looked like the quantum mirror from that episode of SG-1 is actually a quantum mirror... I’m willing to take the chance."</p><p>It's 2019, and the SGC awakens to a laptop from earth - an alternate earth where Stargate was a TV show like Wormhole Xtreme. A laptop filled with fanfiction from a site called AO3 and an interview with Amanda Tapping and Richard Dean Anderson, where they discuss Sam and Jack's feelings for each other.</p><p>--oOo--</p>
</blockquote>

<textarea cols="50" id="embed_code_467491120" rows="4">&lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/works/22737646"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;That's something&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt; (11081 words) by &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/users/RhinoHill"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;RhinoHill&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Chapters: 7/7&lt;br /&gt;Fandom: &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/tags/Stargate%20SG-1"&gt;Stargate SG-1&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Rating: General Audiences&lt;br /&gt;Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply&lt;br /&gt;Relationships: Samantha "Sam" Carter/Jack O'Neill&lt;br /&gt;Characters: Samantha "Sam" Carter, Jack O'Neill, Daniel Jackson, Teal'c (Stargate), Cameron Mitchell (Stargate)&lt;br /&gt;Additional Tags: IFDrabble, IFD2020, Unrequited Love, Breaking the Fourth Wall, Angst and Feels, so many easter eggs&lt;br /&gt;Summary: &lt;p&gt;"Hi. If that’s what you’re called in your version of the universe. If that mirror that looked like the quantum mirror from that episode of SG-1 is actually a quantum mirror... I’m willing to take the chance."&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;It's 2019, and the SGC awakens to a laptop from earth - an alternate earth where Stargate was a TV show like Wormhole Xtreme. A laptop filled with fanfiction from a site called AO3 and an interview with Amanda Tapping and Richard Dean Anderson, where they discuss Sam and Jack's feelings for each other.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;--oOo--&lt;/p&gt;</textarea>

<a href="http://tumblr.com/widgets/share/tool?canonicalUrl=https%3A%2F%2Farchiveofourown.org%2Fworks%2F22737646&amp;title=That%27s%20something%20%2811081%20words%29%20by%20RhinoHill%20%5BAO3%5D&amp;caption=Chapters%3A%207%2F7%3Cbr%20%2F%3EFandom%3A%20%3Ca%20href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Farchiveofourown.org%2Ftags%2FStargate%2520SG-1%22%3EStargate%20SG-1%3C%2Fa%3E%3Cbr%20%2F%3ERating%3A%20General%20Audiences%3Cbr%20%2F%3EWarnings%3A%20No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply%3Cbr%20%2F%3ERelationships%3A%20Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter%2FJack%20O%27Neill%3Cbr%20%2F%3ECharacters%3A%20Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter%2C%20Jack%20O%27Neill%2C%20Daniel%20Jackson%2C%20Teal%27c%20%28Stargate%29%2C%20Cameron%20Mitchell%20%28Stargate%29%3Cbr%20%2F%3EAdditional%20Tags%3A%20IFDrabble%2C%20IFD2020%2C%20Unrequited%20Love%2C%20Breaking%20the%20Fourth%20Wall%2C%20Angst%20and%20Feels%2C%20so%20many%20easter%20eggs%3Cbr%20%2F%3ESummary%3A%20%3Cp%3E%22Hi.%20Um.%20God%2C%20I%20feel%20silly%20doing%20this.%20But%20it%E2%80%99s%20only%20an%20old%20laptop%2C%20I%20guess.%20Not%20too%20much%20to%20lose%20apart%20from%20my%20dignity..%20Okay.%20Phew.%20So%20here%20goes.%20Hello%20SG-1%21%20If%20that%E2%80%99s%20what%20you%E2%80%99re%20called%20in%20your%20version%20of%20the%20universe.%20If%20that%20mirror%20that%20looked%20like%20the%20quantum%20mirror%20from%20that%20episode%20of%20SG-1%20is%20actually%20a%20quantum%20mirror...%20I%E2%80%99m%20willing%20to%20take%20the%20chance.%22%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cp%3EIt%27s%202019%2C%20and%20the%20SGC%20awakens%20to%20a%20laptop%20from%20earth%20-%20an%20alternate%20earth%20where%20Stargate%20was%20a%20TV%20show%20like%20Wormhole%20Xtreme.%20A%20laptop%20filled%20with%20fanfiction%20from%20a%20site%20called%20AO3%20and%20an%20interview%20with%20Amanda%20Tapping%20and%20Richard%20Dean%20Anderson%2C%20where%20they%20discuss%20Sam%20and%20Jack%27s%20feelings%20for%20each%20other.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cp%3E--oOo--%3C%2Fp%3E" style="display:inline-block; <div class="header module">
<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/19155310">In your hands</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/RhinoHill/pseuds/RhinoHill" rel="author">RhinoHill</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">
<span class="landmark">Fandoms:</span>

<ul class="tags commas">

</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>“For… my commanding officer?” Heat flushed across my cheeks before I could chase it away.</p><p>Alyssa’s wizened face crinkled into her smile. “What a quaint term! You T’auri are still remarkably patriarchal for such an advanced civilisation”</p><p>My blush turned crimson as I understood her meaning. “No! No, not in that sense!” I stammered. “He’s in charge of me. At work. We just work together!”</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Sam gets a posthumous letter from Catherine Langford. She decides to follow her advice.</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>2</strong> of <a href="/series/1622911">Conversations</a>
</li>

<h4 class="heading">

<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/18760267">Barefoot</a>

      <!-- do not cache -->

        for <a href="/users/agrainne24/gifts">agrainne24</a>

<h5 class="fandoms heading">
<span class="landmark">Fandoms:</span>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jack%20O'Neill/works">Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Episode:%20s06e15%20Paradise%20Lost/works">Episode: s06e15 Paradise Lost</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>As ridiculous as it may seem, she doesn’t know how to process the information, because even though they’ve virtually lived in each other’s pockets for six years now – this is the first time she remembers seeing him without his shoes and socks.</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>129</strong> of <a href="/series/1234973">Bizarre Holidays</a>
</li>
</ul>

<div class="header module">
<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/18836563">Footloose</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/wackyjacqs/pseuds/wackyjacqs" rel="author">wackyjacqs</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">
<span class="landmark">Fandoms:</span>
<a class="tag" href="/tags/Stargate%20SG-1/works">Stargate SG-1</a>
       
    </h5>
<!--required tags-->

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jack%20O'Neill/works">Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Team%20Bonding/works">Team Bonding</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>There are times when Jack O’Neill looks at his team and all he feels is pride. Then, there are times – like now – when he looks at them and he’s utterly terrified that the fate of the planet is in <em>their</em> hands.</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>135</strong> of <a href="/series/1234973">Bizarre Holidays</a>
</li>
</ul>

<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/18931405">Small Victories</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/wackyjacqs/pseuds/wackyjacqs" rel="author">wackyjacqs</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">
<span class="landmark">Fandoms:</span>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jack%20O'Neill/works">Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Episode:%20s03e22%20Nemesis/works">Episode: s03e22 Nemesis</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Episode:%20s04e01%20Small%20Victories/works">Episode: s04e01 Small Victories</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>“You blew up my ship, Carter. <em>My</em> ship. <em>Mine!</em>”</p>
<p>“Okay,” she sighed. “Firstly, it wasn’t <em>your</em> ship.”</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>143</strong> of <a href="/series/1234973">Bizarre Holidays</a>
</li>
</ul>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Jack is actually smiling for the first time in four days. She tries to tell herself she hasn’t been counting.</p>
</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>"Carter's eyes continued to move swiftly from his eyes to his lips, and he did everything in his power to not mimic the movement himself."</p>
</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>It's one of those "dress up" missions that SG-1 really despise. Except this one goes a little differently for Jack and Sam. Jack will never look at those missions the same way again.</p>
</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>"I didn't leave... because I'd have rather died myself than lose Carter."</p><p>Some love is locked away in a room so deep that you'll never find it again. But when you watch the person you love about to die, somehow, the room finds you.</p><p>--oOo--</p>
</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>There. She’s said it. </p>
<p>She’d love to taste him on her tongue, to breathe him in again as he wraps his arms around her. She’s never felt so drawn to anyone. </p>
<p>Because he sees her. Through his facade of stupid bravado, he looks right into her soul. And he makes her want to shine for him.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>After three years alone, Loran needed a male role model before he went back into society, the Colonel had declared – and who better than him?</p>
</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>On an alien planet, unable to sleep, Sam decides to go stargazing and discovers that Jack had the same idea. Naturally, they decide to watch the skies together, and get to talking. Shippy fluff.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Sam%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Sam Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Sam%20Carter/works">Sam Carter</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jack%20O'Neill/works">Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Fluff/works">Fluff</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Unrepentant%20Fluff/works">Unrepentant Fluff</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Two friends, going to a wedding...  </p>
<p>Skaara: "Will you be coming alone?"<br/>Jack: "I assume Carter's invited too?"<br/>Skaara: "Of course! Will you be coming together?"<br/>Jack: "Together? As in... ?"<br/>Sam: "As in two friends, going to a wedding..."<br/>Jack: "Oh. Sure... Jonas!"</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>

<p>Jack needs to mourn for Daniel. Sam lets him. Set sometime after the end of Season 5.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Jack's doing a favour for Sam, who in turn ends up doing a favour for Janet, and a messy situation ensues.</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>

<li>
          Part <strong>1</strong> of <a href="/series/21182">Education</a>

<!--bookmark item module-->
<!--title, author, fandom-->
<div class="header module">
<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/951869">The unexpected kisses</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/SaidbhinLuch/pseuds/SaidbhinLuch" rel="author">SaidbhinLuch</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">
<span class="landmark">Fandoms:</span>
<a class="tag" href="/tags/Stargate%20SG-1/works">Stargate SG-1</a>
       
    </h5>
<!--required tags-->

<!--warnings again, cast, freeform tags-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/Choose%20Not%20To%20Use%20Archive%20Warnings/works">Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Sam%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Sam Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Sam%20Carter/works">Sam Carter</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jack%20O'Neill/works">Jack O'Neill</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Daniel%20Jackson/works">Daniel Jackson</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Teal'c%20(SG-1)/works">Teal'c (SG-1)</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Humor/works">Humor</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Romance/works">Romance</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>For every year that Sam and Jack knew each other, there was always that moment they never saw coming in which they were either forced to kiss each other, or accidentally did so. Humour, awkwardness and the general barminess that follows SG-1 ensues. And romance, obviously.</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>1</strong> of <a href="/series/55579">The Unexpected Kisses</a>
</li>
</ul>

<p>
<textarea cols="50" id="embed_code_399484349" rows="4">&lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/works/951869"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;The unexpected kisses&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt; (968 words) by &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/users/SaidbhinLuch"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;SaidbhinLuch&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Chapters: 1/?&lt;br /&gt;Fandom: &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/tags/Stargate%20SG-1"&gt;Stargate SG-1&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Rating: Teen And Up Audiences&lt;br /&gt;Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings&lt;br /&gt;Relationships: Sam Carter/Jack O'Neill&lt;br /&gt;Characters: Sam Carter, Jack O'Neill, Daniel Jackson, Teal'c (SG-1)&lt;br /&gt;Additional Tags: Humor, Romance&lt;br /&gt;Series: Part 1 of &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/series/55579"&gt;The Unexpected Kisses&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Summary: &lt;p&gt;For every year that Sam and Jack knew each other, there was always that moment they never saw coming in which they were either forced to kiss each other, or accidentally did so. Humour, awkwardness and the general barminess that follows SG-1 ensues. And romance, obviously.&lt;/p&gt;</textarea>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>How did the team spend their time on P3X-234 after the events of Nemesis?  What's behind those looks between Sam and Jack after they get back?  And why the heck did Teal'c grow a blond goatee?</p><p>**Sam &amp; Jack Multimedia Awards Nominee - Best Adventure (2014) and Canon Compliant (2015)**</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Sam's always known where her heart resides, she's just always tried to ignore it. Maybe now it's time to unlock that door and see what happens.</p>
</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>General Jack O'Neill is bored with flying a desk and takes the chance to go off-world again when the opportunity presents itself. Not wanting to play favorites he leaves SG-1 behind with Carter in charge of the base and takes Ferretti and a diplomatic team with him. Of course, things don't go as planned and it's up to Sam to mount a S&amp;R mission and bring them home safely.</p>
<p>
</p>
</blockquote>

<div class="header module">

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>In an alternate universe, Chuck Kawalsky and Charlie O'Neill survived their fates to fight another day. But on a mission gone wrong, they dial home only to find themselves in another SGC, facing the one thing they never thought they would: their loved ones, alive and well. The fallout from this could be spectacular, or it could be the best thing that's ever happened to all of them.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Ok, so it wasn’t great, but she’s definitely had worse first dates in her life.</p>
</blockquote>

<div class="header module">
<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/20403058">Georgia's wedding date fic</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/amaradangeli/pseuds/amaradangeli" rel="author">amaradangeli</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">
<span class="landmark">Fandoms:</span>
<a class="tag" href="/tags/Stargate%20SG-1/works">Stargate SG-1</a>
       
    </h5>
<!--required tags-->
<ul class="required-tags">

<!--warnings again, cast, freeform tags-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Fake*s*Pretend%20Relationship/works">Fake/Pretend Relationship</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Wedding%20date/works">Wedding date</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/one%20bed/works">one bed</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>“Carter, why is Daniel in my ear about a wedding for someone I don’t know?” </p><p>She looks up from the translocation device SG-7 brought back from the mission to ‘896. “Because he wants me to ask you to go with me.” </p><p>He raises an eyebrow at her. “Why?”</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>The Air Force could tell him not to touch her, but it couldn’t tell him not to love her.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>So how <em>does</em> Sam work all those miracles?  (This is an HP crossover only in the loosest sense of the word, but some background knowledge might be useful.  Spoilers for "Point of View"; it's set mid-S3.)</p>
</blockquote>

<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/1206376">The Fountain</a>
      by

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>The team travels to a planet whose inhabitants may have discovered the secret to eternal youth.  But at what price?  An action/adventure with a bit of S/J ship, natch.  **Sam &amp; Jack Multimedia Awards Nominee - Angst (2016)**</p>
</blockquote>

<div class="header module">
<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/1481152">Five Nights in Nottingham</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/bluemoonmaverick/pseuds/bluemoonmaverick" rel="author">bluemoonmaverick</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Sam%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Sam Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jack%20O'Neill/works">Jack O'Neill</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Sam%20Carter/works">Sam Carter</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Daniel%20Jackson/works">Daniel Jackson</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Teal'c%20(SG-1)/works">Teal'c (SG-1)</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Harry%20Maybourne/works">Harry Maybourne</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Original%20Characters/works">Original Characters</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Action*s*Adventure/works">Action/Adventure</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Romance/works">Romance</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Humor/works">Humor</a></li>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Harry Maybourne (a.k.a. King Arkhan) has gone missing in the mythical Sherwood Forest, and it's up to SG-1 to find him and the ancient treasure he is seeking.  Jack and Sam struggle with their increasingly complicated feelings for each other along the way.  Action and adventure!  Humor and romance!  Men in tights?  This one has it all!<br/><br/>**Sam &amp; Jack Multimedia Awards WINNER - Best Comedy (2014)**</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>

<div class="header module">
<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/14565489">grow me a garden worthy of you</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/professortennant/pseuds/professortennant" rel="author">professortennant</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">
<span class="landmark">Fandoms:</span>
<a class="tag" href="/tags/Stargate%20SG-1/works">Stargate SG-1</a>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>In her lab, there are small jars filled with succulents and cacti--low maintenance plants that make sense for her life of extended stretches of time away. He remembers arching an eyebrow at the prickly garden and Sam shrugging. “To keep McKay away, sir.” </p><p>Or the one in which Jack builds Sam a garden.</p>
</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Coach "General" George Hammond is given one season to turn the fate of the Colorado Springs NHL hockey team, The Stargates, around. To do so, he's going to need the help of retired superstar Jack O'Neill and rising star Samantha Carter. Except, there's enough heat between the two to melt the ice out on the rink...</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>A time-traveler is a harbinger of big decisions and big changes for the crew of Voyager, especially its Captain.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Sent to P4X-524 to recover a mysterious artifact from an ancient alien temple, SG-1 takes along a fifth member: Pete Shanahan.</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>1</strong> of <a href="/series/8172">The Badfic!Pete Chronicles</a>
</li>
</ul>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>The team travels offworld to take care of some mining negotiations, only to meet with an unanticipated challenge on P3X-427.</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>1</strong> of <a href="/series/8169">The P3X-427 Trilogy</a>
</li>
</ul>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Post-Threads. On a little pier over a fishless pond in the moonlight, sit two people with a decision to make. Fluffy fluff. A sweet little one-shot.</p>
</blockquote>

<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/9134434">HopeLights</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/Akamaimom/pseuds/Akamaimom" rel="author">Akamaimom</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">

<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Sam%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Sam Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Sam%20Carter/works">Sam Carter</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jack%20O'Neill/works">Jack O'Neill</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Teal'c%20(SG-1)/works">Teal'c (SG-1)</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Daniel%20Jackson/works">Daniel Jackson</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Romance/works">Romance</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Angst/works">Angst</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Humor/works">Humor</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Hurt*s*Comfort/works">Hurt/Comfort</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Christmas/works">Christmas</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Fluff/works">Fluff</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Christmas%20Fluff/works">Christmas Fluff</a></li>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>After a fairly crappy few months (years?) SG-1 gets sent to what should be a peaceful meet and greet. Naturally, things don't go exactly as planned, but an accident gives Sam and Jack a little time alone together. It turns out to be exactly what they've been needing. Episode tag (peripherally--if you look really hard) to "Desperate Measures". Angsty Christmas guttery-fluffery unabashed Shippiness.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>A different take on the season 6 episode, "The Voyager Conspiracy".</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Decades after Voyager's return to the Alpha Quadrant, reporter/writer Jake Sisko tries to learn the truth about the ship's adventure and its key personnel.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>If Jack had really thought about it, he would have known that apartment hunting with Sam could only lead to trouble.</p>
</blockquote>

<p class="datetime">22 Apr 2009</p>

<!--warnings again, cast, freeform tags-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Sam%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Sam Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jack%20O'Neill/works">Jack O'Neill</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Sam%20Carter/works">Sam Carter</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Janet%20Fraiser/works">Janet Fraiser</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Hurt/works">Hurt</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Comfort*s*Romance/works">Comfort/Romance</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>A/N: This came about from a discussion on the GW Family thread about the great hug Sam and Jack shared in <i>Heroes</i>. Somebody, I don't remember who, asked us to think of other times they might have shared that kind of hug. This is my response. I'm beginning to think this is the beginning of yet another series. Hmmm. As always, I save, savor, and answer all reviews left with an email and/or reply option.</p><p>This was going to be a series, but seriously, I can only do so much fanfic writing while publishing and working on my doctorate, so this went by the wayside. Each story is complete in its own right.</p>
</blockquote>

<a href="/works/221819">Fever</a>
      by

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>A/N: Once again Sally strikes again. She posted this question on the Sam/Jack Family thread (httpcolon double forwardslash forum dot gateworld dot netslashshowpost dotphp?p=10265830&amp;postcount=184172): <i><b>1- would you think sam and/or jack would be more honest when very tired, or the opposite?</b></i> That question sparked this.</p><p>Set on a planet of my choosing. This is not a <i>Campfire</i> fic.</p>
</blockquote>

</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Sam%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Sam Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jack%20O'Neill/works">Jack O'Neill</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Sam%20Carter/works">Sam Carter</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Cassandra%20Fraiser/works">Cassandra Fraiser</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Janet%20Fraiser/works">Janet Fraiser</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Romance/works">Romance</a></li>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>A/N: Written for Ship Day, 2009. This is a standalone story that doesn't fit into any Campfires or Embrace Me stories – but I'm hoping you'll like it anyway. As always, I don't take feedback and reviews for granted; they are, in fact, the best pay any fanfic author can receive (well, short of Amanda reading this and deciding that I just <i>have</i> to work for her!).</p><p>The title for this piece is in honor of the men and women who made the tremendous effort and sacrifice to put humans on the moon, forty years ago this month.</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>1</strong> of <a href="/series/9336">Promises</a>
</li>
</ul>

<p class="note">Copy and paste the following code to link back to this work (<kbd>CTRL A</kbd>/<kbd>CMD A</kbd> will select all), or use the Tweet or Tumblr links to share the work on your Twitter or Tumblr account.</p>
<p>
<textarea cols="50" id="embed_code_362192956" rows="4">&lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/works/221863"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Small Steps and Giant Leaps&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt; (2909 words) by &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/users/Polrobin"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Polrobin&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Chapters: 1/1&lt;br /&gt;Fandom: &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/tags/Stargate:%20SG-1"&gt;Stargate: SG-1&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Rating: Teen And Up Audiences&lt;br /&gt;Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply&lt;br /&gt;Relationships: Sam Carter/Jack O'Neill&lt;br /&gt;Characters: Jack O'Neill, Sam Carter, Cassandra Fraiser, Janet Fraiser&lt;br /&gt;Additional Tags: Romance&lt;br /&gt;Series: Part 1 of &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/series/9336"&gt;Promises&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Summary: &lt;p&gt;A/N: Written for Ship Day, 2009. This is a standalone story that doesn't fit into any Campfires or Embrace Me stories – but I'm hoping you'll like it anyway. As always, I don't take feedback and reviews for granted; they are, in fact, the best pay any fanfic author can receive (well, short of Amanda reading this and deciding that I just &lt;i&gt;have&lt;/i&gt; to work for her!).&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;The title for this piece is in honor of the men and women who made the tremendous effort and sacrifice to put humans on the moon, forty years ago this month.&lt;/p&gt;</textarea>
</p>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Six hours into their captivity—more than twelve hours since Pike's abduction and almost twenty hours since Number One's last sleep cycle—she slid into the illusion without realising it.</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>2</strong> of <a href="/series/935">Paradigm Shift</a>
</li>
</ul>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>She looks at him with that complex expression that’s punctuated their relationship ever since Pete barged onto the scene.  The one that looks like a question, or a plea – the one he’s never really understood and has never dared pursue.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>The day Sam Carter marries Pete Shanahan is not the worst day of Jack’s life; he’s already lived that day.  But that doesn't make it easy.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Sam throws her back out the same week the Colonel is scheduled for his third knee surgery.</p>
</blockquote>

<ul class="series">

          Part <strong>1</strong> of <a href="/series/5981">Plan C</a>

      by

      <!-- do not cache -->

</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/Choose%20Not%20To%20Use%20Archive%20Warnings/works">Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Samantha%20%22Sam%22%20Carter*s*Jack%20O'Neill/works">Samantha "Sam" Carter/Jack O'Neill</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Handholding/works">Handholding</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Fluff/works">Fluff</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Aliens%20Made%20Them%20Do%20It/works">Aliens Made Them Do It</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>When the ambassador of PX5-872 told him with a nervous stutter that Major Carter had been inadvertently struck in the lab with a technology designed to stimulate her desire for intimacy, Jack had been expecting to have to quarantine her; had been expecting flushed skin and heaving breaths and maybe Sam pressing her body against his and rolling her hips and begging him to take her. </p><p>What he hadn’t expected was her hand in his.</p>
</blockquote>

<p>
<textarea cols="50" id="embed_code_352260772" rows="4">&lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/works/16463123"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;our hearts are holding hands&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt; (1365 words) by &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/users/professortennant"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;professortennant&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Chapters: 1/1&lt;br /&gt;Fandom: &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/tags/Stargate%20SG-1"&gt;Stargate SG-1&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Rating: General Audiences&lt;br /&gt;Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings&lt;br /&gt;Relationships: Samantha "Sam" Carter/Jack O'Neill&lt;br /&gt;Additional Tags: Handholding, Fluff, Aliens Made Them Do It&lt;br /&gt;Summary: &lt;p&gt;When the ambassador of PX5-872 told him with a nervous stutter that Major Carter had been inadvertently struck in the lab with a technology designed to stimulate her desire for intimacy, Jack had been expecting to have to quarantine her; had been expecting flushed skin and heaving breaths and maybe Sam pressing her body against his and rolling her hips and begging him to take her. &lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;What he hadn’t expected was her hand in his.&lt;/p&gt;</textarea>
</p>

<h4 class="heading">

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Mia Colt was in love with her captain, once, for maybe twenty-four hours at most. Then she realized she had another role to play.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">

</blockquote>

class="tag" href="/tags/Tuvok%20(minor%20appearance)/works">Tuvok (minor appearance)</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Seven%20of%20Nine%20(minor%20appearance)/works">Seven of Nine (minor appearance)</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Birthday/works">Birthday</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Holodecks*s*Holosuites/works">Holodecks/Holosuites</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Humor/works">Humor</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Fluff/works">Fluff</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Fluffety%20floofety%20fluff/works">Fluffety floofety fluff</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/With%20a%20mild%20dash%20of/works">With a mild dash of</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Emotional%20Hurt*s*Comfort/works">Emotional Hurt/Comfort</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/for%20the%20sake%20of%20some/works">for the sake of some</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Non-Sexual%20Intimacy/works">Non-Sexual Intimacy</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/(and%20some%20char%20developement%20for%20poor%20later-season%20Chakotay%20my%20gawd)/works">(and some char developement for poor later-season Chakotay my gawd)</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Naomi Wildman's birthday celebration was interrupted by a harrowing red alert, and now the crew is determined to make up for it at her re-do party--even if that means engaging in party games that normally would be beneath a grown Starfleet officer's dignity.</p><p>But B'Elanna has finally figured out how to merge the holodecks' power source with the rest of the power-starved ship, so this is the holodecks' last hurrah. Or is it?</p>
</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Boldy going where I've never gone before: Voyager fic. I started watching it over the summer, and I know I have a bunch of other works I need to be finishing, but I was inspired and this was short and I whipped it up really fast. Basically I kinda hated that Year of Hell just disappeared at the end of the episode without any consequences or evidence that it had happened... and I wanted a different ending. So Here's one. First Voyager fic I've ever posted. Be kind. &lt;3</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Newly graduated Kathryn Janeway boards her first ever ship. Her Admiral father is just as embarrassing as any other parent when he insists on accompanying her to the ship. father-daughter moments and adorableness ensue.</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>3</strong> of <a href="/series/1304231">Her Light, His Peace</a>
</li>
</ul>

<dd class="chapters">1/1</dd>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>The homecoming KJ deserves, as canon compliant as possible, with some hints of J/C from a very confused Chakotay (why he's dating 7 I can't possibly explain)</p>
</blockquote>

<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/3929467">Undercover: Peraltiago Stylez</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/amaliabalash/pseuds/amaliabalash" rel="author">amaliabalash</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">
<span class="landmark">Fandoms:</span>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jake%20Peralta*s*Amy%20Santiago/works">Jake Peralta/Amy Santiago</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jake%20Peralta/works">Jake Peralta</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Amy%20Santiago/works">Amy Santiago</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Fake*s*Pretend%20Relationship/works">Fake/Pretend Relationship</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Amy's plan of ignoring and denying her feelings for Jake until they went away was going fine, thank you very much, until one day they get assigned an undercover case that could completely change her career - and their friendship.</p><p>(Not Johnny and Dora compliant - I started writing this before we had even heard that we were getting an undercover episode)</p>
</blockquote>
<!--stats-->

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">

</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>She wants to say <em>I didn’t want to bother you and Sophia,</em> she wants to say <em>I want to be happy for you, I really, really do,</em> she wants to say <em>is this how you felt when I was with Teddy?,</em> she wants to say <em>I’m sorry.</em></p><p>Instead she says, “It’s fine. It was a nice walk.” Her fingers are numb at the tips and she presses them harder into her cup, staring at the bridge of his nose to create the illusion of meeting his eyes.</p><p>Or: Jake thinks she's the one, Amy pines for someone, anxiety waits for no one, and winter settles over New York.</p>
</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Her phone chimes, jolting her out of her internal monologue. She smiles.<br/><em>“so do i have complete creative control here? badass mafia shootout at the precinct???? godzilla is destroying the city???”</em><br/><em>“Just make it seem important but believable, okay?”</em><br/><em>“sure. never fear, jake the hero is on his way 2 rescue u, fair maiden”</em><br/>in which amy reluctantly enlists jake to help get her out of a bad blind date &amp; unwanted feelings ensue.<br/>(late season 2 peraltiago pining)</p>
</blockquote>
