<!--bookmark item module-->
<!--title, author, fandom-->
<div class="header module">
<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/10962249">Five Times Janeway and Chakotay Definitely Weren’t On a Date</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/muldy/pseuds/muldy" rel="author">muldy</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">
<span class="landmark">Fandoms:</span>
<a class="tag" href="/tags/Star%20Trek:%20Voyager/works">Star Trek: Voyager</a>
       
    </h5>
<!--required tags-->
<ul class="required-tags">
<li> <a aria-controls="#modal" class="help symbol question modal" href="/help/symbols-key.html" title="Symbols key"><span class="rating-teen rating" title="Teen And Up Audiences"><span class="text">Teen And Up Audiences</span></span></a></li>
<li> <a aria-controls="#modal" class="help symbol question modal" href="/help/symbols-key.html" title="Symbols key"><span class="warning-choosenotto warnings" title="Choose Not To Use Archive Warnings"><span class="text">Choose Not To Use Archive Warnings</span></span></a></li>
<li> <a aria-controls="#modal" class="help symbol question modal" href="/help/symbols-key.html" title="Symbols key"><span class="category-het category" title="F/M"><span class="text">F/M</span></span></a></li>
<li> <a aria-controls="#modal" class="help symbol question modal" href="/help/symbols-key.html" title="Symbols key"><span class="complete-yes iswip" title="Complete Work"><span class="text">Complete Work</span></span></a></li>
</ul>
<p class="datetime">21 May 2017</p>
</div>
<!--warnings again, cast, freeform tags-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/Choose%20Not%20To%20Use%20Archive%20Warnings/works">Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Chakotay*s*Kathryn%20Janeway/works">Chakotay/Kathryn Janeway</a></li> <li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Chakotay%20*a*%20Kathryn%20Janeway/works">Chakotay &amp; Kathryn Janeway</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Chakotay%20(Star%20Trek)/works">Chakotay (Star Trek)</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Kathryn%20Janeway/works">Kathryn Janeway</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Angst/works">Angst</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>"He had been enjoying being on this planet immensely, and now he was enjoying it even more, with her by his side. He’d been feeling cooped up more than normal recently, since they had returned from New Earth. The claustrophobia of being on a ship day in and day out, with only a holodeck for reprieve, was starting to get to him.<br/>And he missed spending all day with her.<br/>Well she was still there, but it was different. Their moments alone weren’t how they had been prior to New Earth – there was something else there. Something more that neither of them were willing to admit."</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>1</strong> of <a href="/series/738423">Five Times</a>
</li>
</ul>
<!--stats-->

<dt class="words">Words:</dt>
<dd class="words">5,119</dd>

<dd class="chapters">1/1</dd>
<dt class="comments">Comments:</dt>
<dd class="comments"><a href="/works/10962249?show_comments=true#comments">25</a></dd>

<dd class="kudos"><a href="/works/10962249#comments">98</a></dd>

<a href="http://tumblr.com/widgets/share/tool?canonicalUrl=https%3A%2F%2Farchiveofourown.org%2Fworks%2F10962249&amp;title=Five%20Times%20Janeway%20and%20Chakotay%20Definitely%20Weren%E2%80%99t%20On%20a%20Date%20%285119%20words%29%20by%20muldy%20%5BAO3%5D&amp;caption=Chapters%3A%201%2F1%3Cbr%20%2F%3EFandom%3A%20%3Ca%20href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Farchiveofourown.org%2Ftags%2FStar%2520Trek%3A%2520Voyager%22%3EStar%20Trek%3A%20Voyager%3C%2Fa%3E%3Cbr%20%2F%3ERating%3A%20Teen%20And%20Up%20Audiences%3Cbr%20%2F%3EWarnings%3A%20Creator%20Chose%20Not%20To%20Use%20Archive%20Warnings%3Cbr%20%2F%3ERelationships%3A%20Chakotay%2FKathryn%20Janeway%2C%20Chakotay%20%26%20Kathryn%20Janeway%3Cbr%20%2F%3ECharacters%3A%20Chakotay%20%28Star%20Trek%29%2C%20Kathryn%20Janeway%3Cbr%20%2F%3EAdditional%20Tags%3A%20Angst%3Cbr%20%2F%3ESeries%3A%20Part%201%20of%20%3Ca%20href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Farchiveofourown.org%2Fseries%2F738423%22%3EFive%20Times%3C%2Fa%3E%3Cbr%20%2F%3ESummary%3A%20%3Cp%3E%22He%20had%20been%20enjoying%20being%20on%20this%20planet%20immensely%2C%20and%20now%20he%20was%20enjoying%20it%20even%20more%2C%20with%20her%20by%20his%20side.%20He%E2%80%99d%20been%20feeling%20cooped%20up%20more%20than%20normal%20recently%2C%20since%20they%20had%20returned%20from%20New%20Earth.%20The%20claustrophobia%20of%20being%20on%20a%20ship%20day%20in%20and%20day%20out%2C%20with%20only%20a%20holodeck%20for%20reprieve%2C%20was%20starting%20to%20get%20to%20him.%3Cbr%20%2F%3EAnd%20he%20missed%20spending%20all%20day%20with%20her.%3Cbr%20%2F%3EWell%20she%20was%20still%20there%2C%20but%20it%20was%20different.%20Their%20moments%20alone%20weren%E2%80%99t%20how%20they%20had%20been%20prior%20to%20New%20Earth%20%E2%80%93%20there%20was%20something%20else%20there.%20Something%20more%20that%20neither%20of%20them%20were%20willing%20to%20admit.%22%3C%2Fp%3E" style="display:inline-block; <div class="header module">
<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/12210999">Five Times Chakotay Didn't Tell Janeway He Loves Her (And One Time He Did)</a>
      by

<a href="/users/muldy/pseuds/muldy" rel="author">muldy</a>
</h4>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>‘Plus, who would want to date the Captain anyway?’ she joked.<br/>Without thinking he almost said ‘I would’, but stopped himself just before the words came out of his mouth.</p>
</blockquote>

<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/13618422">Home</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->

        for <a href="/users/Cheile/gifts">cheile (Cheile)</a>, <a href="/users/arcadia75/gifts">arcadia75</a>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/Choose%20Not%20To%20Use%20Archive%20Warnings/works">Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Chakotay*s*Kathryn%20Janeway/works">Chakotay/Kathryn Janeway</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Kathryn%20Janeway/works">Kathryn Janeway</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Chakotay%20(Star%20Trek)/works">Chakotay (Star Trek)</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Post-Endgame/works">Post-Endgame</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/I%20fixed%20it/works">I fixed it</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Angst/works">Angst</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/But%20with%20a%20happy%20ending/works">But with a happy ending</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Kathryn Janeway had one more thing nagging at her as she stepped up to the window of her Ready Room to look out at Earth appearing on the horizon. She knew the rest of the crew was gathered in the mess hall, or on the bridge, watching together, but somehow she didn’t feel a part of it anymore.</p><p>She had done her part.</p><p>She got them home.</p><p>And she had never felt so alone in the universe.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Compilation of all my King of Scars writings from Tumblr that aren't full-fledged fics</p>
</blockquote>

<a href="/works/14965835">VIP Dinner Emergency</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->

</h4>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Chakotay*s*Kathryn%20Janeway/works">Chakotay/Kathryn Janeway</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Kathryn%20Janeway/works">Kathryn Janeway</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Chakotay%20(Star%20Trek)/works">Chakotay (Star Trek)</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Post-Endgame/works">Post-Endgame</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Fix-It/works">Fix-It</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Post-Canon%20Fix-It/works">Post-Canon Fix-It</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>“Your message said it was an emergency?” Chakotay questions, walking into Kathryn’s and finding her covered in flour.</p>
<p>“Oh thank goodness you’re here!” she exclaims, emerging from the kitchen to embrace him, “I have this VIP I’m supposed to charm coming over and the replicator is down.”</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>24</strong> of <a href="/series/285435">Janeway/Chakotay Tumblr Prompts</a>
</li>
</ul>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>After discovering a secret about her mother’s past, Kathryn Janeway’s daughter goes back in time to change the future.  A Voyager Christmas story, and a very AU Endgame rewrite.</p>
</blockquote>

<!--warnings again, cast, freeform tags-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jake%20Peralta*s*Amy%20Santiago/works">Jake Peralta/Amy Santiago</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jake%20Peralta/works">Jake Peralta</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Amy%20Santiago/works">Amy Santiago</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Not%20Canon%20Compliant/works">Not Canon Compliant</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Christmas/works">Christmas</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Fluff/works">Fluff</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Secret%20Santa/works">Secret Santa</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Pining/works">Pining</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Getting%20Together/works">Getting Together</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>She snaps up reflexively, eyes wide. “You think this is from <i>Charles</i>?” The question leaves her lips before she’s able to think about it. She almost winces at how her voice squeaks, a step higher than usual.</p><p>Jake scoffs. “This probably cost at least a hundred bucks, Amy. Who else would go Full Boyle on something as dumb as Secret Santa? Nobody takes precinct-wide gift exchanges this seriously. Like, I legit just went and got HR Jim candy from the vending machine.”</p><p>A Christmas-themed Get Together fic separate from the canon timeline, feat. Pining!Amy and the art of thoughtful gift giving.</p>
</blockquote>

<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/10683258">Write in the Heart - you've left me speechless</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/EveningRose/pseuds/EveningRose" rel="author">EveningRose</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">

<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jake%20Peralta*s*Amy%20Santiago/works">Jake Peralta/Amy Santiago</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Jake%20Peralta/works">Jake Peralta</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Amy%20Santiago/works">Amy Santiago</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Gina%20Linetti/works">Gina Linetti</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Rosa%20Diaz/works">Rosa Diaz</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Charles%20Boyle/works">Charles Boyle</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Terry%20Jeffords/works">Terry Jeffords</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Hitchcock%20and%20Scully%20mentioned/works">Hitchcock and Scully mentioned</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Soulmate AU where Jake and Amy communicate through writing letters to each other as they grow up.</p><p>"Her soulmate is someone with incredibly messy writing, it’s so messy it almost escapes the lines and is difficult to read. Amy seriously doubts the ability of the soulmate council - or whatever group of people it is who somehow magically assign people to their soulmates - to accurately match people if they’ve matched her with someone who is already the polar opposite of her in hand-writing."</p>
</blockquote>

class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/mutual%20pining%20after%20a%20certain%20point/works">mutual pining after a certain point</a></li> <li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Multi-chap/works">Multi-chap</a></li>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>For someone whose job requires an unusually large amount of personal risk on a near daily basis, Amy Santiago has not dedicated much time considering how she might one day die. The vague assumption that it will probably happen on the job - via stray bullets or careening cars or massive explosions - has been enough to satisfy any musing.</p><p>She never imagined doctor's visits or specialist consultations or diagnoses. She never imagined hospital gowns and thinning hair and chemotherapy.</p><p>And she never, ever imagined <i>cancer.</i></p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>1</strong> of <a href="/series/951477">we'll face the worst</a>
</li>
</ul>

<p class="note">Copy and paste the following code to link back to this work (<kbd>CTRL A</kbd>/<kbd>CMD A</kbd> will select all), or use the Tweet or Tumblr links to share the work on your Twitter or Tumblr account.</p>
<p>
<textarea cols="50" id="embed_code_321916325" rows="4">&lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/works/11466108"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;if you want me to stay, i will stay by your side&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt; (91186 words) by &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/users/elsaclack"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;elsaclack&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Chapters: 11/11&lt;br /&gt;Fandom: &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/tags/Brooklyn%20Nine-Nine%20(TV)"&gt;Brooklyn Nine-Nine (TV)&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Rating: Teen And Up Audiences&lt;br /&gt;Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply&lt;br /&gt;Relationships: Amy Santiago/Teddy Wells, Jake Peralta &amp; Amy Santiago, Jake Peralta/Amy Santiago, (eventually)&lt;br /&gt;Characters: Amy Santiago, Jake Peralta, Teddy Wells, Ray Holt, Terry Jeffords, Rosa Diaz, Gina Linetti, Charles Boyle, Michael Hitchcock, Norm Scully, Victor Santiago&lt;br /&gt;Additional Tags: Sick Character, Cancer, Inspired by 50/50, basically amy has cancer, schwannoma neurofibrosarcoma to be exact, Angst, Hurt/Comfort, Angst with a Happy Ending, pining!jake, mutual pining after a certain point, Multi-chap&lt;br /&gt;Series: Part 1 of &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/series/951477"&gt;we'll face the worst&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Summary: &lt;p&gt;For someone whose job requires an unusually large amount of personal risk on a near daily basis, Amy Santiago has not dedicated much time considering how she might one day die. The vague assumption that it will probably happen on the job - via stray bullets or careening cars or massive explosions - has been enough to satisfy any musing.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;She never imagined doctor's visits or specialist consultations or diagnoses. She never imagined hospital gowns and thinning hair and chemotherapy.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;And she never, ever imagined &lt;i&gt;cancer.&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;</textarea>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Amy’s a month old, too young to remember anything, and he shows up on her skin for the very first time in the form of an explosion of color.</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>1</strong> of <a href="/series/951468">in every lifetime, i'll find you</a>
</li>
</ul>

<h5 class="byline heading">

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Amy Santiago loves her new apartment. One bedroom, one bathroom, good neighborhood and decent rent. One thing she does not love? Her neighbors. More precisely, whoever lives in the apartment that shares a paper thin wall with hers.</p>
</blockquote>

<textarea cols="50" id="embed_code_321915980" rows="4">&lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/works/11758425"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;everything is easier when you're home&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt; (98246 words) by &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/users/sergeantsantiago"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;sergeantsantiago&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Chapters: 16/?&lt;br /&gt;Fandom: &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/tags/Brooklyn%20Nine-Nine%20(TV)"&gt;Brooklyn Nine-Nine (TV)&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Rating: Teen And Up Audiences&lt;br /&gt;Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply&lt;br /&gt;Relationships: Jake Peralta/Amy Santiago&lt;br /&gt;Characters: Jake Peralta, Amy Santiago, Charles Boyle, Rosa Diaz, Gina Linetti, Ray Holt, Terry Jeffords&lt;br /&gt;Additional Tags: Slow Burn, Alternate Universe - Neighbors, and i mean very VERY slow burn, all the best tropes because im trash, Fake Dating, bed sharing, will include more once we get to them, background dianetti&lt;br /&gt;Summary: &lt;p&gt;Amy Santiago loves her new apartment. One bedroom, one bathroom, good neighborhood and decent rent. One thing she does not love? Her neighbors. More precisely, whoever lives in the apartment that shares a paper thin wall with hers.&lt;/p&gt;</textarea>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>There's a lot of universes out there, and in some of them, Amy and Jake have babies, not with each other. <br/>Title from Absolute Beginners by The Jam.</p>
</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>“This yazkan box is used in a Wellia celebration of thanks and prosperity. It simply scans the person holding it and shows you something you truly want to see!”</p>
<p>“Ah yes!” he exclaims. “Whenever I open it, I see this Talaxian fire slug.”</p>
<p>“You see a slug?” Tom snorts.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Voyager's crew deals with the emotional fallout of their return to the Alpha Quadrant in "Endgame."</p>
</blockquote>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>A few months after their return to the Alpha Quadrant, the Voyager crew come together to assist one of their own. Along the way they face a new threat from an old enemy...make a new friend...and say goodbye to an old one. Adventure, humor, romance and fun. J/C, P/T, K/OC. Enjoy.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>While examining an ancient artefact Janeway and Chakotay are pulled into some form of simulation telling the story of 'The Longest Night'.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>“It’s often just enough to be with someone. I don’t need to touch them. Not even talk. A feeling passes between you both. You’re not alone.” — Marilyn Monroe</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>A Secret Santa is set up on Voyager, all the senior staff are required to participate. But Kathryn can only think of the Christmases she is missing out on with her family.</p><p>This is the fifth story in Talsi's Twelve Days of Ficmas. Stories do not need to be read in any particular order</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>5</strong> of <a href="/series/362393">Talsi's Twelve Days of Ficmas</a>
</li>
</ul>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>Kathryn is having a rather difficult time leaving Voyager, feeling lost and alone now that she has accomplished her goal.</p><p>Endgame Fixer.</p><p>On the first day of ficmas Talsi gave to me, a fluffy fic about an oak tree!</p><p>The first of my twelve days of ficmas J/C fics. They do not need to be read in any specific order.</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>1</strong> of <a href="/series/362393">Talsi's Twelve Days of Ficmas</a>
</li>
</ul>

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>A temporal paradox gives Janeway the chance to reassess the choices she’s made and those she’s going to make, even when the future seems inevitable.</p>
</blockquote>

<a href="http://tumblr.com/widgets/share/tool?canonicalUrl=https%3A%2F%2Farchiveofourown.org%2Fworks%2F8106958&amp;title=gold%20shall%20be%20the%20cage%20of%20your%20heart%20%28643%20words%29%20by%20kallliope%20%5BAO3%5D&amp;caption=Chapters%3A%201%2F1%3Cbr%20%2F%3EFandom%3A%20%3Ca%20href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Farchiveofourown.org%2Ftags%2FSix%2520of%2520Crows%2520Series%2520-%2520Leigh%2520Bardugo%22%3ESix%20of%20Crows%20Series%20-%20Leigh%20Bardugo%3C%2Fa%3E%3Cbr%20%2F%3ERating%3A%20Not%20Rated%3Cbr%20%2F%3EWarnings%3A%20No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply%3Cbr%20%2F%3ERelationships%3A%20Kaz%20Brekker%2FInej%20Ghafa%3Cbr%20%2F%3ECharacters%3A%20Kaz%20Brekker%2C%20Inej%20Ghafa%2C%20Jesper%20Fahey%2C%20Nina%20%28mentioned%29%2C%20Van%20Eck%20%28mentioned%29%3Cbr%20%2F%3EAdditional%20Tags%3A%20clueless%20Kaz%2C%20also%20gold%3Cbr%20%2F%3ESeries%3A%20Part%201%20of%20%3Ca%20href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Farchiveofourown.org%2Fseries%2F554467%22%3ENone%20Here%20Glitter%20but%20Gold%3C%2Fa%3E%3Cbr%20%2F%3ESummary%3A%20%3Cp%3EKaz%20comes%20to%20term%20with%20his%20newest%20addiction.%20%27Comes%20to%20term%27%20meaning%20utter%20denial.%3C%2Fp%3EBookmarker%27s%20Notes%3A%20%3Cp%3EHahahaha.%20A%20brilliant%20idea%20that%20could%20totally%20be%20applied%20to%20some%20of%20my%20other%20ships.%3C%2Fp%3E" style="display:inline-block; text-indent:-9999px; overflow:hidden; width:81px; height:20px; background:url('//platform.tumblr.com/v1/share_1.png') top left no-repeat transparent; border-bottom: none;" target="_blank" title="Share on Tumblr">

<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>A new strain of parem is tampered with to make a truth serum, which Kaz unknowingly consumes.</p>
</blockquote>

<h6 class="landmark heading">Bookmarker's Notes</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff notes">
<p>Ahhh...back in my SoC days, this was my absolute favorite. Looking at it now the grammar bugs me a bit, but it's still in character any by one of my favorite SoC authors.</p>
</blockquote>

<!--bookmark item module-->
<!--title, author, fandom-->
<div class="header module">
<h4 class="heading">
<a href="/works/8194417">There were grief and ruins (and you were the miracle)</a>
      by

      <!-- do not cache -->
<a href="/users/fandammit/pseuds/fandammit" rel="author">fandammit</a>
</h4>
<h5 class="fandoms heading">
<span class="landmark">Fandoms:</span>
<a class="tag" href="/tags/Six%20of%20Crows%20Series%20-%20Leigh%20Bardugo/works">Six of Crows Series - Leigh Bardugo</a>
       
    </h5>
<!--required tags-->
<ul class="required-tags">
<li> <a aria-controls="#modal" class="help symbol question modal" href="/help/symbols-key.html" title="Symbols key"><span class="rating-general-audience rating" title="General Audiences"><span class="text">General Audiences</span></span></a></li>
<li> <a aria-controls="#modal" class="help symbol question modal" href="/help/symbols-key.html" title="Symbols key"><span class="warning-no warnings" title="No Archive Warnings Apply"><span class="text">No Archive Warnings Apply</span></span></a></li>
<li> <a aria-controls="#modal" class="help symbol question modal" href="/help/symbols-key.html" title="Symbols key"><span class="category-het category" title="F/M"><span class="text">F/M</span></span></a></li>
<li> <a aria-controls="#modal" class="help symbol question modal" href="/help/symbols-key.html" title="Symbols key"><span class="complete-yes iswip" title="Complete Work"><span class="text">Complete Work</span></span></a></li>

<p class="datetime">03 Oct 2016</p>
</div>
<!--warnings again, cast, freeform tags-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Tags</h6>
<ul class="tags commas">
<li class="warnings"><strong><a class="tag" href="/tags/No%20Archive%20Warnings%20Apply/works">No Archive Warnings Apply</a></strong></li><li class="relationships"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Kaz%20Brekker*s*Inej%20Ghafa/works">Kaz Brekker/Inej Ghafa</a></li><li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Kaz%20Brekker/works">Kaz Brekker</a></li> <li class="characters"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Inej%20Ghafa/works">Inej Ghafa</a></li><li class="freeforms"><a class="tag" href="/tags/Post%20Crooked%20Kingdom/works">Post Crooked Kingdom</a></li>
</ul>
<!--summary-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Summary</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff summary">
<p>He stretched his hand out to her, fingers bare and waiting - a gentleman’s offer from a boy whose hands cradled knives and carved violence.</p><p>Inej stared at the graceful taper of his fingers. He was still known as Dirtyhands, still went out with gloved hands and dark thoughts. Around her, though, the gloves remained on his desk or in his pocket. He would let his knuckles brush against the back of her hand as they walked, would skim his fingers lightly across her skin when saying goodbye. It felt like a small miracle every time.<br/>----------------<br/>Kaz and Inej, post-Crooked Kingdom</p>
</blockquote>
<h6 class="landmark heading">Series</h6>
<ul class="series">
<li>
          Part <strong>1</strong> of <a href="/series/561997">I exist in two places (here and where you are)</a>
</li>
</ul>

<h5 class="byline heading">

</h5>
<p class="datetime">27 Feb 2019</p>
<!--meta-->
<!--notes-->
<h6 class="landmark heading">Bookmarker's Notes</h6>
<blockquote class="userstuff notes">
<p>This is one of the first Kanej fanfics I remember reading. Not sure of anything about it...I don't read much SoC anymore. But I'm pretty sure it was of the few that were true to character, which is VERY hard to do.</p>
</blockquote>

<p>
<textarea cols="50" id="embed_code_321912974" rows="4">&lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/works/8194417"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;There were grief and ruins (and you were the miracle)&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt; (1799 words) by &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/users/fandammit"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;fandammit&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Chapters: 1/1&lt;br /&gt;Fandom: &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/tags/Six%20of%20Crows%20Series%20-%20Leigh%20Bardugo"&gt;Six of Crows Series - Leigh Bardugo&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Rating: General Audiences&lt;br /&gt;Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply&lt;br /&gt;Relationships: Kaz Brekker/Inej Ghafa&lt;br /&gt;Characters: Kaz Brekker, Inej Ghafa&lt;br /&gt;Additional Tags: Post Crooked Kingdom&lt;br /&gt;Series: Part 1 of &lt;a href="https://archiveofourown.org/series/561997"&gt;I exist in two places (here and where you are)&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Summary: &lt;p&gt;He stretched his hand out to her, fingers bare and waiting - a gentleman’s offer from a boy whose hands cradled knives and carved violence.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Inej stared at the graceful taper of his fingers. He was still known as Dirtyhands, still went out with gloved hands and dark thoughts. Around her, though, the gloves remained on his desk or in his pocket. He would let his knuckles brush against the back of her hand as they walked, would skim his fingers lightly across her skin when saying goodbye. It felt like a small miracle every time.&lt;br /&gt;----------------&lt;br /&gt;Kaz and Inej, post-Crooked Kingdom&lt;/p&gt;Bookmarker's Notes: &lt;p&gt;This is one of the first Kanej fanfics I remember reading.
